name: Super Bonk 2
description:
Dive headfirst into the action with your famously hard head in the first
installment of the Bonk series on the Super NES. This time, Bonk has
been caught in King Drool's trap and hurled into darkness. To find his
way back to prehistoric times, he must embark on an adventure through
streets, caves and eventually outer space!

Progress through the stages controlling Bonk, but watch out for enemies
blocking your path. Eat meat to transform Bonk and perform even more
powerful attacks! Many challenges lie in Bonk's path. In addition to
Bonk's spin and climb moves, you can use items like candy, which changes
Bonk's size, to overcome these obstacles!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
